attributes.action: PEOPLE ON BENEFITS/DOLE SHOULD BE GIVEN VOUCHERS/COUPONS INSTEAD OF MONEY!
attributes.additional_details: TO STOP BENEFIT CHEATS AND PEOPLE ABUSING THE SYSTEM, PEOPLE ON BENEFITS SHOULD BE GIVEN FOOD VOUCHERS. IN REALITY  TAXPAYERS ARE WORKING HARD BUT BENEFIT CHEATS ARE ENJOYING THEMSELVES ON THE DOLE. GET THIS GENERATION TO UNDERSTAND HARD WORK PAYS OFF; DO NOT GIVE IT TO THEM ON A PLATE.
